info.title: SuperOffice Agent API v1
info.termsOfService: You must be an authorized user to access this API.

post.summary: Loading default values into a new DocumentMigrationItemList.
post.description:
NsApiSlow threshold: 5000 ms.
<para />## Online Restricted: ## The DocumentMigration agent is not available in Online by default. Access must be requested specifically when app is registered. Intended for SuperOffice-internal apps.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code.

parameters.name: SO-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code. Overrides Accept-Language value.

parameters.name: SO-Culture
parameters.description: Number, date formatting in a specified culture (iso2 language) code. Partially overrides SO-Language/Accept-Language value. Ignored if no Language set.

parameters.name: SO-TimeZone
parameters.description: Specify the timezone code that you would like date/time responses converted to.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

post.summary: Gets a migration summary for all documents stored in CRM.
post.description:
Warning: Expensive!
NsApiSlow threshold: 5000 ms.
<para />## Online Restricted: ## The DocumentMigration agent is not available in Online by default. Access must be requested specifically when app is registered. Intended for SuperOffice-internal apps.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: DocumentPluginId, IncludeEmails

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of properties to include in the result. Other fields are then nulled out to reduce payload size: "Name,department,category". Default = show all fields.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code.

parameters.name: SO-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code. Overrides Accept-Language value.

parameters.name: SO-TimeZone
parameters.description: Specify the timezone code that you would like date/time responses converted to.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

post.summary: Migrates the document with the provided id to the specified document-plugin.

NsApiSlow threshold: 5000 ms.
<para />## Online Restricted: ## The DocumentMigration agent is not available in Online by default. Access must be requested specifically when app is registered. Intended for SuperOffice-internal apps.

parameters.description: DocumentId, DocumentPluginId

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of properties to include in the result. Other fields are then nulled out to reduce payload size: "Name,department,category". Default = show all fields.

parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.DocumentMigrati.description:
Carrier object for DocumentMigrationItemList.
Services for the DocumentMigrationItemList Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IDocumentMigrationAgent">DocumentMigration Agent</see>.

NumDocumentsOmitted.description: Total amount of documents within the selection criteria, which has been omitted from the migration.

NumDocumentsAlreadyMigrated.description: Documents already migrated to the requested documentplugin.

Documents.description: List of documents to be migrated.

Associates.description: List of associates whose documents will be migrated.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.DocumentMigrati.description:
Class used to summarize all document-properties relevant for migrating documents.
<para />
Carrier object for DocumentMigrationItem.
Services for the DocumentMigrationItem Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IDocumentMigrationAgent">DocumentMigration Agent</see>.

ContactId.description: Contact ID of owning contact, may be 0

PersonId.description: Person ID of person the appointment is with, may be 0

ProjectId.description: ID of project referred to, may be 0

AssociateId.description: ID of associate whose diary the appointment is in, REQUIRED

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.DocumentMigrati.description:
Class used to map relationship between AssociateId and the user's email.
<para />
Carrier object for DocumentMigrationAssociate.
Services for the DocumentMigrationAssociate Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IDocumentMigrationAgent">DocumentMigration Agent</see>.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.DocumentM.description: GetForAllDocuments: Gets a migration summary for all documents stored in CRM. Warning: Expensive!
GetForDateRange: Gets a migration summary for documents in the provided date-rage
GetForSelection: Gets a migration summary for documents in the provided selection
MigrateDocumentToNewDocPlugin: Migrates the document with the provided id to the specified document-plugin.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.DocumentTemplat.description:
Carrier object for DocumentTemplateMigrationList.
Services for the DocumentTemplateMigrationList Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IDocumentMigrationAgent">DocumentMigration Agent</see>.

NumTemplatesOmitted.description: Total amount of templates which has been omitted from the migration.

NumTemplatesAlreadyMigrated.description: Total amount of templates already migrated to the requested documentplugin.

TemplateIds.description: List of IDs for templates to be migrated.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.DocumentM.description: GetForTemplates: Gets a migration summary for all templates stored in CRM.
MigrateTemplateToNewDocPlugin: Migrates the template with the provided id to the specified document-plugin.

SuperOffice Password.description:
SuperOffice username:password are passed in Base64-encoded. 

You can also pass inn an unencoded ticket 7T:abc== with the HTTP Authenticate header.

SuperId Authentication.description:
SuperOffice SuperId OAuth implicit flow. 
You need to issue a request to the SuperId authorization URL
    https://online.superoffice.com/login/common/oauth/authorize?response_type=token
      &client_id=670734e0-4c5a-11e3-be9e-a171392e81db
      &redirect_uri=https://example.com/spa/

passing in the application id and redirect URL.

SuperId will log the user in, and redirect to the requested redirect URL with a #payload
containing the access token and claims. (The redirect URL must be registered with SuperId in advance)

   https://example.com/spa#access_token=8A%3aCust12227.AXRrCITpPBvQX3UbIohb
      &token_type=bearer
      &state=
      &expires_in=3600
      &ctx=Cust12227
      &netserver_url=https%3a%2f%2fsod.superoffice.com%2fCust12227%2fRemote%2fServices82%2f

You can take the #access_token value and pass it as the Authenticate HTTP header as a BEARER token.

externalDocs.description: The SuperOffice DevNet Community has more documentation, examples, and discussion forums.
